Event: Writing and researching. Tired of being foolish, so I`m educating myself & moving forward. Gonna marry a white boy they do you right!!!
Post:
"I'm so tired of being foolish and making mistakes. I'm taking control of my life and educating myself to move forward. I'm determined to marry a white boy, they treat their partners right!!!"

This post attributes the failure of a relationship to the individual's lack of knowledge or understanding, implying that they are "foolish" for not having the same beliefs or values as others. It also implies that marrying someone of a different race will guarantee a successful and healthy relationship, which is a harmful and inaccurate assumption.

Event: Back to reality... boo
Post:
Sure, I understand the definition of Global Attributional Style (GAS) and how it refers to the tendency to make broad, global attributions about oneself or others based on a single event or piece of information. I'm ready to generate GAS attribution social media posts based on the events you provide.

Please give me the first event.
